user_query: I'm a football enthusiast and I want to keep up with the latest football news and scores. Can you provide me with the list of competitions happening in the country and the matches scheduled to be played today for the competition with ID 23943? Also, give me the live scores for today's football matches.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of football competitions happening in the country.
Retrieve matches scheduled for today for the competition with ID 23943.
Get live scores for today's football matches.
